data.title: Remembering one of the most powerful and distinguished storytellers of our time: Toni Morrison. She became the first African American...
data.meta_description:
13K likes, 69 comments - nobelprize_org on February 18, 2024: "Remembering one of the most powerful and distinguished storytellers of our time: Toni Morrison.

She became the first African American woman to be awarded a Nobel Prize when she received the literature prize in 1993.

Morrison's works often depict difficult circumstances and the dark side of humanity, but still convey integrity and redemption. The way she reveals the stories of individual lives conveys insight into, understanding of, and empathy for her characters.

Read an excerpt from her novel 'Sula' by clicking the link in our bio. 

#NobelPrize #quote".
